verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <WH7200> Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <WH853> שׁ֨וֹר <WH7794> ox אָחִ֜יךָ <WH251> thy brother's א֤וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׂיוֹ֙ <WH7716> or his sheep נִדָּחִ֔ים <WH5080> go astray וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <WH5956> and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> you הָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> thyself from them thou shalt in any case תְּשִׁיבֵ֖ם <WH7725> bring them again לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> unto thy brother

וְאִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֨א <WH3808> is not קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> [be] not nigh אָחִ֛יךָ <WH251> And if thy brother אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְדַעְתּ֑וֹ <WH3045> unto thee or if thou know וַאֲסַפְתּוֹ֙ <WH622> him not then thou shalt bring אֶל־ <WH413> about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> it unto בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> thine own house וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> shall remain עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> you עַ֣ד <WH5704> until דְּרֹ֤שׁ <WH1875> seek אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> and it shall be with thee until thy brother אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וַהֲשֵׁבֹת֖וֹ <WH7725> after it and thou shalt restore it to him again לֽוֹ׃

וְכֵ֧ן <WH3651> In like manner תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shalt thou do לַחֲמֹר֗וֹ <WH2543> with his ass וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> the same תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <WH6213> and so shalt thou do לְשִׂמְלָתוֹ֒ <WH8071> with his raiment וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> likewise תַּעֲשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> shalt thou do לְכָל־ <WH3605> anything אֲבֵדַ֥ת <WH9> and with all lost thing אָחִ֛יךָ <WH251> of thy brother's אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תֹּאבַ֥ד <WH6> which he hath lost מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> and you וּמְצָאתָ֑הּ <WH4672> and thou hast found לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> likewise thou mayest לְהִתְעַלֵּֽם׃ <WH5956> not hide ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <WH7200> Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמ֨וֹר <WH2543> ass אָחִ֜יךָ <WH251> thy brother's א֤וֹ <WH176> or שׁוֹרוֹ֙ <WH7794> or his ox נֹפְלִ֣ים <WH5307> fall down בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <WH5956> and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> you הָקֵ֥ם <WH6965> thyself from them thou shalt surely תָּקִ֖ים <WH6965> help him to lift [them] up again עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> wear כְלִי־ <WH3627> shall not wear that which pertaineth גֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> unto a man עַל־ <WH5921> and אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> The woman וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִלְבַּ֥שׁ <WH3847> put גֶּ֖בֶר <WH1397> neither shall a man שִׂמְלַ֣ת <WH8071> garment אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> on a woman's כִּ֧י <WH3588> for תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <WH8441> [are] abomination יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever עֹ֥שֵׂה <WH6213> for all that do אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> so פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> If יִקָּרֵ֣א <WH7122> chance קַן־ <WH7064> nest צִפּ֣וֹר ׀ <WH6833> If a bird's לְפָנֶ֡יךָ <WH6440> to be before בַּדֶּ֜רֶךְ <WH1870> thee in the way בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any עֵ֣ץ ׀ <WH6086> in any tree א֣וֹ <WH176> or עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> or on the ground אֶפְרֹחִים֙ <WH667> [whether they be] young ones א֣וֹ <WH176> or בֵיצִ֔ים <WH1000> or eggs וְהָאֵ֤ם <WH517> and the dam רֹבֶ֙צֶת֙ <WH7257> sitting עַל־ <WH5921> and הָֽאֶפְרֹחִ֔ים <WH667> upon the young א֖וֹ <WH176> or עַל־ <WH5921> on הַבֵּיצִ֑ים <WH1000> or upon the eggs לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> thou shalt not take הָאֵ֖ם <WH517> the dam עַל־ <WH5921> with הַבָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> with the young

שַׁלֵּ֤חַ <WH7971> [But] thou shalt in any wise תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵ֔ם <WH517> let the dam וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> the young תִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> and take לָ֑ךְ לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> order יִ֣יטַב <WH3190> to thee that it may be well לָ֔ךְ וְהַאֲרַכְתָּ֖ <WH748> with thee and [that] thou mayest prolong יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> [thy] days ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When תִבְנֶה֙ <WH1129> When thou buildest בַּ֣יִת <WH1004> house חָדָ֔שׁ <WH2319> a new וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> then thou shalt make מַעֲקֶ֖ה <WH4624> a battlement לְגַגֶּ֑ךָ <WH1406> for thy roof וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> you will not תָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> that thou bring דָּמִים֙ <WH1818> not blood בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> upon thine house כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> if any man הַנֹּפֵ֖ל <WH5307> fall מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִזְרַ֥ע <WH2232> Thou shalt not sow כַּרְמְךָ֖ <WH3754> thy vineyard כִּלְאָ֑יִם <WH3610> with divers seeds פֶּן־ <WH6435> or תִּקְדַּ֗שׁ <WH6942> be defiled הַֽמְלֵאָ֤ה <WH4395> lest the fruit הַזֶּ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> of thy seed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּזְרָ֔ע <WH2232> which thou hast sown וּתְבוּאַ֖ת <WH8393> and the fruit הַכָּֽרֶם׃ <WH3754> of thy vineyard ס
לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַחֲרֹ֥שׁ <WH2790> Thou shalt not plow בְּשׁוֹר־ <WH7794> with an ox וּבַחֲמֹ֖ר <WH2543> and an ass יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together ס

לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תִלְבַּשׁ֙ <WH3847> Thou shalt not wear שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <WH8162> a garment of divers sorts צֶ֥מֶר <WH6785> [as] of woollen וּפִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6593> and linen יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together ס

גְּדִלִ֖ים <WH1434> thee fringes תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> Thou shalt make לָּ֑ךְ עַל־ <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֛ע <WH702> upon the four כַּנְפ֥וֹת <WH3671> quarters כְּסוּתְךָ֖ <WH3682> of thy vesture אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תְּכַסֶּה־ <WH3680> wherewith thou coverest בָּֽהּ׃ ס
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> take אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> If any man אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> a wife וּבָ֥א <WH935> and go in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> about וּשְׂנֵאָֽהּ׃ <WH8130> unto her and hate

וְשָׂ֥ם <WH7760> And give לָהּ֙ עֲלִילֹ֣ת <WH5949> occasions דְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> of speech וְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> against her and bring up עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name רָ֑ע <WH7451> an evil וְאָמַ֗ר <WH559> upon her and say אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> this woman הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> I לָקַ֔חְתִּי <WH3947> I took וָאֶקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> and when I came אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> about וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> to her I found לָ֖הּ בְּתוּלִֽים׃ <WH1331> her not a maid

וְלָקַ֛ח <WH3947> take אֲבִ֥י <WH1> Then shall the father [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <WH5291> damsel ק) וְאִמָּ֑הּ <WH517> and her mother וְהוֹצִ֜יאוּ <WH3318> and bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> בְּתוּלֵ֧י <WH1331> virginity [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֛ה <WH5291> damsel ק) אֶל־ <WH413> to זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> unto the elders הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city הַשָּֽׁעְרָה׃ <WH8179> in the gate

וְאָמַ֛ר <WH559> shall say אֲבִ֥י <WH1> father [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <WH5291> damsel ק) אֶל־ <WH413> to הַזְּקֵנִ֑ים <WH2205> unto the elders אֶת־ <WH853> בִּתִּ֗י <WH1323> my daughter נָתַ֜תִּי <WH5414> I gave לָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> unto this man הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> to this לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> to wife וַיִּשְׂנָאֶֽהָ׃ <WH8130> and he hateth

וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold ה֡וּא <WH1931> he שָׂם֩ <WH7760> And lo he hath given עֲלִילֹ֨ת <WH5949> occasions דְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> of speech לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> [against her] saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> I found לְבִתְּךָ֙ <WH1323> not thy daughter בְּתוּלִ֔ים <WH1331> a maid וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> this בְּתוּלֵ֣י <WH1331> virginity בִתִּ֑י <WH1323> and yet these [are the tokens of] my daughter's וּפָֽרְשׂוּ֙ <WH6566> And they shall spread הַשִּׂמְלָ֔ה <WH8071> the cloth לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> the elders הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

וְלָֽקְח֛וּ <WH3947> shall take זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> And the elders הָֽעִיר־ <WH5892> of that city הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> that man וְיִסְּר֖וּ <WH3256> and chastise אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְעָנְשׁ֨וּ <WH6064> And they shall amerce אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> מֵ֣אָה <WH3967> him in an hundred כֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> [shekels] of silver וְנָתְנוּ֙ <WH5414> and give לַאֲבִ֣י <WH1> [them] unto the father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <WH5291> of the damsel כִּ֤י <WH3588> because הוֹצִיא֙ <WH3318> because he hath brought up שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name רָ֔ע <WH7451> an evil עַ֖ל <WH5921> and בְּתוּלַ֣ת <WH1330> upon a virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֽוֹ־ תִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall remain לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> and she shall be his wife לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> he may לְשַׁלְּחָ֖הּ <WH7971> not put her away כָּל־ <WH3605> her all יָמָֽיו׃ <WH3117> all his days ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> be true הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> become הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> But if this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this לֹא־ <WH3808> was not נִמְצְא֥וּ <WH4672> be not found בְתוּלִ֖ים <WH1331> [and the tokens of] virginity [לַנַּעַר כ] (לַֽנַּעֲרָֽה׃ <WH5291> damsel ק)

וְהוֹצִ֨יאוּ <WH3318> Then they shall bring out אֶת־ <WH853> [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֜ה <WH5291> damsel ק) אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> to the door בֵּית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֗יהָ <WH1> of her father's וּסְקָלוּהָ֩ <WH5619> shall stone אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> and the men עִירָ֤הּ <WH5892> of her city בָּאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> her with stones וָמֵ֔תָה <WH4191> that she die כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָשְׂתָ֤ה <WH6213> because she hath wrought נְבָלָה֙ <WH5039> folly בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel לִזְנ֖וֹת <WH2181> to play the whore בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑יהָ <WH1> in her father's וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> from among ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִמָּצֵ֨א <WH4672> be found אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> If a man שֹׁכֵ֣ב ׀ <WH7901> lying עִם־ <WH5973> with אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> with a woman בְעֻֽלַת־ <WH1166> married בַּ֗עַל <WH1167> to an husband וּמֵ֙תוּ֙ <WH4191> die גַּם־ <WH1571> shall both שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> then they shall both of them הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> [both] the man הַשֹּׁכֵ֥ב <WH7901> that lay עִם־ <WH5973> with הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> with the woman וְהָאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> and the woman וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> so shalt thou put away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> evil מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> from Israel ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> If יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become [נַעַר כ] (נַעֲרָ֣ה <WH5291> damsel ק) בְתוּלָ֔ה <WH1330> [that is] a virgin מְאֹרָשָׂ֖ה <WH781> be betrothed לְאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> unto an husband וּמְצָאָ֥הּ <WH4672> find אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> and a man בָּעִ֖יר <WH5892> her in the city וְשָׁכַ֥ב <WH7901> and lie עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> you
